articles.title: DOLO-65O makers spent Rs 1,000 crore as freebies on doctors for prescribing: Supreme Court told
articles.description: Senior Advocate Sanjay Parikh, appearing for Federation of Medical & Sales Representatives Association of India, submitted that DOLO had invested 1,000 core in freebies to have its anti-fever drug prescribed to patients.

articles.title: Bilkis Bano's Rapists Are "Brahmins, Have Good Sanskar": BJP MLA
articles.description: The 11 men convicted for the rape of Bilkis Bano and released by the Gujarat government after 15-odd years in jail, were "Brahmins" and had "good sanskaar", the BJP's sitting MLA from Godhra has said.
articles.content:
Bilkis Bano was five months' pregnant when she was gangraped during the 2002 Gujarat riots.

articles.title: Boat with weapons washes up Maharashtra coast triggering terror scare
articles.description: A boat with weapons was found near Harihareshwar shore in Raigad district of Maharashtra on Thursday. Maharashtra Deputy CM Devendra Fadnavis said that prima facie, there is no terror angle.
